snippet.title: Ideology in Friction - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Ideology in Friction is the story of Clacier and Annette, two knights of the Kingdom of Viktor. They're forced into an impossible situation where they must make a decision that would change their entire lives. What will become of these two knights? Find out in Ideology in Friction!

On Steam:
http://bit.ly/2FoNnuz

Kagura Games on Steam:
http://bit.ly/2SibPSb

Developer: OneOne1 
Publisher: Kagura Games
